survey_name: Electric Scooter Sharing User Experience Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of electric scooter sharing services to understand their satisfaction, usage patterns, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to measure frequency. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How often do you use electric scooter sharing services?

questions.question_text: What are the primary reasons you use electric scooter sharing services? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to capture multiple reasons. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for specificity.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with optional open text for 'Other'

script.question_text: What are the primary reasons you use electric scooter sharing services? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of electric scooters in your area?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of electric scooters in your area?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance your experience with electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance your experience with electric scooter sharing services?

questions.question_text: Have you experienced any safety concerns while using electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Use a simple yes/no question to filter for follow-up questions.

script.question_text: Have you experienced any safety concerns while using electric scooter sharing services?

questions.question_text: If yes, please describe the safety concerns you encountered.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather detailed feedback on safety issues. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: If yes, please describe the safety concerns you encountered.
